sources.title: "The Navigator" (1924) starring Buster Keaton
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems     "The Navigator" is another great comedy starring Buster Keaton.   The Navigator is ranked number 59 in the list of The Top 100 Silent Era Films of the influential website Silent Era. In 2018 the film was selected for preservation in the National Film Registry as being deemed "culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant." The film has an outstanding 7.7 rating in IMDB.   Directed by               Donald Crisp, Buster Keaton Produced by             Buster Keaton Productions, Incorporated Scenario by                Jean Havez, Joseph Mitchell and Clyde Bruckman        Starring                     Buster Keaton, Kathryn McGuire, Frederick Vroom, Clarence Burton Cinematography        Byron Houck, Elgin Lessley Distributed by           Metro-Goldwyn Distributing Corporation Release date               October 13, 1924 Running time             60 min. Country                      United States Language                    Silent film, English intertitles     Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976: "Allowance is made for "fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Non-profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favor of fair use."

sources.title: The Navigator
sources.description: Rollo decides to marry his sweetheart Betsy and sail to Honolulu. When she rejects him he decides to go alone but boards the wrong ship, the "Navigator" owned by Betsy's father. Unaware of this, Betsy boards the ship to look for her father. whom spies capture before cutting the ship loose. It drifts out to sea with the two socialites each unaware of anyone else on board.

sources.title: The Navigator (1924)
sources.description: MARINHEIRO POR DESCUIDO ( The Navigator ) ( Filme Completo / Legendado em Português ) Data de Lançamento: 28  de Setembro de 1924 » SOBRE O FILME: Rollo (Buster Keaton) decide se casar com sua namorada Betsy e navega para Honolulu. Quando ela o rejeita ele decide ir embora sozinho, mas embarca no navio errado, o "Navigator" de propriedade do pai de Betsy. Sem saber disso, Betsy embarca no navio para procurar seu pai. Os dois acabam ficando juntos a deriva no mar. . A mais bem-sucedida em termos financeiros de todas as películas de longa-metragem de Buster Keaton produzidas em estúdio para a Metro ou MGM, THE NAVIGATOR (Marinheiro por Descuido) foi e é considerada por muitos fãs de Keaton o filme mais engraçado que ele já fez. Ele interpretou um milionário à deriva em um transatlântico com mais ninguém a bordo, além de Kathryn McGuire.  » » DIREÇÃO: Donald Crisp, Buster Keaton  GÊNERO: Ação, Comédia, Romance ORIGEM: USA  DURAÇÃO: 59 minutos » » ELENCO PRINCIPAL: Buster Keaton ... Rollo Treadway Kathryn McGuire ... Betsy O'Brien Frederick Vroom ... John O'Brien Clarence Burton ... Spy (uncredited) H.N. Clugston ... Spy (uncredited) Noble Johnson ... Cannibal Chief (uncredited)

sources.title: The Navigator (1924)
sources.description: I've been researching newly public domain films from 1929 and earlier, so I'm uploading the best possible copies that I can find. After the critical and commercial low point of his previous film, Buster Keaton set out to make a more exciting and accessible picture. The Navigator follows two people who are stranded on a cruise ship together, and their comedic attempts to try and to make it back to land. The film was a huge hit financially and critically, serving to allow Keaton to make multiple more films afterwards.

sources.title: The Navigator (1924) HD with Score
sources.description: The wealthy and impulsive Rollo Treadway decides to propose to his beautiful socialite neighbor, Betsy O’Brien. Although Betsy turns Rollo down, he still opts to go on the cruise that he intended as their honeymoon. When circumstances find both Rollo and Betsy on the wrong ship, they end up having adventures on the high seas.

sources.title: The Navigator (1924) [Colorized, 4K, 60FPS]
sources.description: The Navigator is a 1924 black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2022 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @  https://colab.research.google.com Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing:  https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify  A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS:  https://rife-vfi.github.io A.I. Upscaling to 4K:  https://ffmpeg.org GPU: Google Colab. This movie is in public domain category and it is Copyright free.

metadata.Plot: Rollo decides to marry his sweetheart Betsy and sail to Honolulu. When she rejects him he decides to go alone but boards the wrong ship, the "Navigator" owned by Betsy's father. Unaware of this, Betsy boards the ship to look for her father. whom spies capture before cutting the ship loose. It drifts out to sea with the two socialites each unaware of there being anyone else on board.
